1370: Marcibilia was born in Die Camp in 1370.
Got married to Eremboldus at age 22 in 1370.
1384: Gave birth to Lieuin in 1384 at age 36.
1371: Gave birth to Lambrecht in 1371 at age 23.
1373: Gave birth to Gerart in 1373 at age 25.
1374: Gave birth to Herman in 1374 at age 26.
1376: Gave birth to Douwen in 1376 at age 28.
1377: Gave birth to Brundonis in 1377 at age 29.
1380: Gave birth to Geldmaro in 1380 at age 32.
Lost son Geldmaro when Geldmaro was 1 years old.
1381: Gave birth to Ysewin in 1381 at age 33.
